text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Since that day at the fast food<n>restaurant, Jordan and I have
been<n>hard at work preparing for the Tracen<n>Meet.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: No... I'm good! I can't let training this<n>basic tire me out.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Graaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We've made it to the last day before<n>the Tracen Meet. As I
turn to go home<n>after another day of training, Jordan<n>
grabs my arm.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, um... This is gonna sound<n>low-key lame, but like... I
don't think<n>I've ever wanted to win more than I<n>do now.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
B-but... what if I lose? Ahaha... What<n>if, after all that, I still
can't—
choice_data_list:
Don't worry. You're not the same runner you
were before.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
choice_data_list: You can win this. I promise.
You can win this. I promise.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Pfft...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You trust me waaay too much, you<n>know that? I mean, I
totes appreciate<n>it, but still!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Finally, the Tracen Meet arrives.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Tosen Jordan's back? Now<n>that I think about it, I
remember seeing<n>her training more lately.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Same here. She seemed to have<n>given up for a while there,
though. I<n>wonder if she'll be able to finish<n>today's race...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With emotions running high, the<n>2,000-meter turf race
begins!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
(Come on, girl, just stay calm.<n>Remember your training and...
Hey,<n>I'm doing it! I've got this!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The race is swiftly moving towards<n>the fourth and final
corner! Tosen<n>Jordan's in a good position! Can she<n>
maintain her lead?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Uraurararaugh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What's this?! Gold Ship races<n>forward with amazing speed!
She's<n>steadily pulling away from Tosen<n>Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: And everyone in my class is alreadysooo much better than me. I'msick of being a cringey loser all thetime, but that's what's happening...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: (If I lose here... If I lose again...)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: (I'll lose my motivation for real this<n>time!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"That desire to win is going to be your<n>greatest weapon."
"You can win this. I<n>promise."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"That desire to win is going to be your<n>greatest weapon."
"You can win this. I<n>promise."

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
(Seriously... Always going on and on<n>about how I can win...
Why do you<n>believe in me so much anyway?!)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ugh, fine! Time to show this crowd areal glow-up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Tosen Jordan?! Tosen Jordan<n>is chasing after Gold
Ship, and gaining<n>on her!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're neck and neck! Will it be<n>Gold Ship?! Tosen
Jordan?! Who will<n>reach the goal first?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: It's Tosen Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Ehehe, this feeling really isthe vibe.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I'm beat... and ready to pop off! I'm<n>talking a facial mask,
oil massage, and<n>a little aromatherapy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That last spurt to first place really got<n>the crowd going. The
2,000-meter turf<n>race ends in a roar of applause.
choice_data_list: That was an amazing race, you know.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I know, I know! Seriously, you<n>stuck on repeat or
something? I could<n>hear you simping during the race too.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
So, real talk... With today's race over,<n>doesn't that mean
our little deal<n>together is done too? Just wondering,<n>but...
are you training anybody right<n>now?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: If not, I was thinking... You kinda needa racer to train to keep your job, right?In that case, I suppose I'd be okay being scouted by you.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean, if that's what you want.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her invitation may be flippant, but I<n>can tell she's serious
about the offer.<n>And, well, I don't have any reason to<n>
refuse!
choice_data_list: Of course—I'd love to be your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... All right, guess that means<n>we're, like... a team for
real now.<n>Looking forward to it, Trainer. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Theeere you areee!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've been looking aaaall over for you,<n>bluey! How'd you get
so<n>flishy-flashy?! On that track, you were<n>like fwoosh,
zoom! Pow! I like you,<n>gutsy girl!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Say, how about we dig a tunnel all the<n>way to Brazil?! We'll
feel the heat of<n>the Earth's mantle together!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Wait, huh? What are you talking<n>about? You're acting super
sus right<n>now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From that day forward, Gold Ship<n>could frequently be found
hovering<n>around Tosen Jordan... But that's a<n>story for
another time.
